group_1.narration: I was recently asked to do a rather excessive@favor.
And I told Arisa about it...

group_1.textRight: You're reading a picture book to kids?

group_1.textLeft: There's a children's club I used to be part@of ages ago.

group_1.textRight: That's where kids meet to...do things or@whatever, right?

group_1.textLeft: And one of those "things" is reading@picture books aloud.
Sometimes they have a former member from@the group come and take part.

group_1.textRight: And so they asked you to help out?
I mean, it's just reading a picture book,@right?
Just walk over, read a little, and you're@done!

group_1.textLeft: The reading part isn't the problem.
Like I mentioned, I used to be part of this@group.
They remembered my father was a picture@book author.

group_1.textRight: They're asking you to read one of your@dad's books?

group_1.textLeft: That'd be a pain for me too.
No, they asked me to do something even more@unreasonable!

group_1.textRight: More of a pain than that?

group_1.textLeft: ...to make the picture book that I'll be@reading!
